{
  "weekly_summary": "Breadth stayed constructive with PSU/infra and renewables leading; metals (copper) rebounded late-week, NBFCs steady, while staples/IT were range-bound. We deploy part of cash into high-liquidity momentum (infrastructure towers and airports) and keep a cash buffer for volatility.",

    },
    {

      "symbol": "INDUSTOWER",
      "shares": 5,
      "amount": 1807.75,
      "reason": "Trend continuation; higher close vs prior sessions (₹361.55) and solid volumes through the week. Telecom-tower capex cycle tailwind. Risk: stop near ₹350."
    }
  ],
